channel.name: SANMATEO_SIU_OUT_JSON
channel.description: 2020-12-07 jer - Created to receive San Mateo Scheduling SIU transactions converted from HL7 to JSON and sent/delivered to AristaMd RESTful HTTP receiver.

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Parse HL7v2 Message - ChannelMap
Convert HL7v2 to JSON

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;

codeTemplateLibrary.name: AristaMd-Utilities
codeTemplateLibrary.description:
This library was added upon migration to version 3.3.0. It includes all pre-existing code templates, and is set to be included on all pre-existing and new channels.
You should create your own new libraries and assign code templates to them as you see fit. You should also link libraries to specific channels, so that you're not necessarily including all code templates on all channels all the time.
